articles.title: Dinosaurs Thrived During A Mass Extinction Event In Freezing Temperatures: Study

articles.title: Arsenal sign Gabriel Jesus from Manchester City

articles.author: Satya Prakash
articles.title: Eknath Shinde sails through floor test 163-99
articles.description: Maharashtra CM Eknath Shinde on Monday won the floor test in the state assembly on the last day of the two-day special session of the House.
articles.content: In the 288-member house, 164 MLAs voted for the motion of confidence, while 99 voted against it.
